title: Miami's Housing Shortage Hits Affordability: Codina
description: Codina Partners CEO Ana-Marie Codina says South Florida faces a growing affordability problem as housing demand outstrips supply and a proposal by Governor Ron DeSantis to eliminate property taxes on owner-occupied homes risks worsening the burden on renters. She spoke to Bloomberg's Dani Burger at a Bloomberg New Voices event in Miami.  (Source: Bloomberg)
